Professional Summary

Mechanical Engineering student at Cornell University (Class of 2027) with extensive experience in high-performance drone systems, CAD-driven mechanical design, structural analysis, and rapid prototyping. President & Full Team Technical Lead for Cornell University Autonomous Drone (CUAD), overseeing system architecture, fabrication workflows, electronics integration, and field testing.

Key Skills

  • Mechanical Design & CAD: Creo, Fusion 360, SolidWorks, Onshape
  • Fabrication: CNC milling, 3D printing, composites, assembly
  • Analysis & Simulation: ANSYS, structural/aero intuition
  • Software: Python, MATLAB, C++, Java
  • Aerial Systems: multirotors, fixed-wing, high-speed platforms
  • Leadership: technical direction, team operations, budgeting, mentorship
